key_themes: Institutional crypto adoption and regulatory clarity
Mega-cap tech leadership and AI infrastructure momentum
Liquidity deterioration and market maker positioning risk
Selective dispersion-based rallies over broad market strength
risk_factors: Liquidity conditions at 2022 lows creating reversal vulnerability
Unhedged market maker exposure and narrow GEX transitions
Exchange security vulnerabilities and operational fragility
Regulatory enforcement actions and margin requirement changes
Bitcoin technical rejection signaling contagion risk
